ca.ualberta.controllers
Class TaggingScreenController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.controllers.SCController
      ca.ualberta.controllers.TaggingScreenController

public class TaggingScreenController
extends SCController

Simple controller for the TaggingScreenActivity. Retrieves all tags that exist in the database, and populates an ArrayList containing all existing tags. Notifies any handlers that the list has changed.

Field Summary
static int GET_ALL_TAGS
          Message code to tell controller to retrieve all tags.
static int UPDATED_TAGS
          Message code to notify handlers that the tag list has been updated.

Constructor Detail

TaggingScreenController

public TaggingScreenController(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
Constructor that initializes a new TaggingScreenController with an ArrayList that will hold the tags. The tags parameter will be empty in this case.

Parameters:
tags - An ArrayList that will contain all the tags in the database. Normally, an empty ArrayList will be provided and will be populated later.

handleMessage

                             java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from class: SCController
Allows a subclass of SCController to respond to messages that various entities will will send it.

Returns:
Whether or not the message was handled. A controller does not necessarily have to handle every message that is sent to it. It can ignore a message.

dispose

public void dispose()
Description copied from class: SCController
Method will be called when the controller is to be destroyed. Basically what will happen is here is disposing of any HandlerThread objects.
